:py:mod:`evaluation.eval_metrics`
=================================

.. py:module:: evaluation.eval_metrics


Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   evaluation.eval_metrics.get_evaluation_report



.. py:function:: get_evaluation_report(y_pred, y_true, task, prefix = '')

   Get values for common evaluation metrics
   :param y_pred: predicted values
   :param y_true: true values
   :param task: ML task to solve
   :param prefix: prefix to be added to the key if multiple eval metrics are collected
   :return: dictionary with common metrics
